title: Wolf Dawn
description: THIS BOOK IS NOW SOLD WITH A NEW COVER. THIS IS THE ORIGINAL COVER VERSION.Ashton Chayton is the last of his race, and he wants revenge.Stranded on a backwater planet, his survival depends on the Red Wolves of Opan. Despite his ability to enter the minds and bodies of both people and animals, Ashton has been through the torments of hell and is ready to even the score.Unfortunately, his enemies want him too. Admiral Neopol Jones will torture him to unlock the secret of his power. The Ferals would enslave him. The influential Lord Andros just wants him dead.Ashton must fight impossible odds, but he has allies -- the woman he loves, his wolf family, and a man who Ashton thinks he hates. Ashton only wants two things--revenge and the Lady Lindha. But Ashton's greatest enemy may just be himself.
author: Susan  Cartwright
